comments.body: You should do this another time, to see whether this operation is idempotent (same as for the ones below).

Also, since the module supports check mode, the common pattern should be:
1. Do change in check mode
2. Do change
3. Do change again (idempotent)
4. Do change again (idempotent, check mode)
5. Assert that
   - 1 is changed
   - 2 is changed
   - 3 is not changed
   - 4 is not changed

See [here](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/test/integration/targets/docker_container/tasks/tests/start-stop.yml#L13-L52) for an example. (Most docker_* tests don't do that yet, but that's another thing which should be changed eventually.)
